summary: Aya Matsuura  is a female Japanese singer, an idol, an actress, and a TV performer.
full_text: Aya Matsuura  also known to her fans as Ayaya, is a Japanese pop singer and actress from Himeji, Hyogo, Japan. Her husband is Keita Tachibana and as a result, her legal name is Aya Tachibana .
title: Aya Matsuura
